name: ESCAPE (itch) (ZeusX)
description:
Two brothers have been kidnapped by an evil scientist, that was able to alter their genetic code, giving the older brother super strength, and gave the other high speed, and jumping ability. He trapped them in maze in his lab, trying to test their limits.

What he didn't know is, when they're in close proximity, they merge into a more powerful and unstoppable being.

Your objective is to navigate through the levels, avoid obstacles (and enemies), and to not get killed, note that if one of the brothers get killed, escape becomes no longer a possibility.

[music borrowed from: Carpenter Brut]

This game has been made for GGJN, in 2 days, by team Clock Work.

"Pretty impressive for a first try" -Dragoonsmurf twitch.tv/dragoonsmurf
